import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search asset verifications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/verifications"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries asset verification records based on asset IDs and filter criteria. Use this to retrieve audit history for compliance reporting or to view all verifications for a set of assets.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify target assets: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to get `AssetId` values.
2. Query verifications: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/verifications](/docs/api/assets/search-asset-verifications) with `AssetIds` array.
3. Review individual records with [GET /api/v1.0/assets/verifications/\{assetVerificationId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-verification-by-id).

**Minimal Required Fields**: none (empty request returns all verifications).

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for searching asset verifications.","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","description":"Filter to verifications for specific assets.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Additional filter criteria.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Filter condition for search/list operations. Based on C# `DataFilter` from `Spark.Shared.Models.DataFramework`. Supports both simple filters and nested filter groups.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Field name or facet to filter on (e.g., 'Status', 'LocationId', 'CreatedDate')"},"Ids":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of UUIDs to filter by (for ID-based facets)"},"Values":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Array of string values to filter by"},"Op":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Filter operations for DataFilter queries. Based on C# `DataFilterOperations` enum from `Spark.Shared.Enums`.","enum":["None","Equal","Greater","Less","GreaterOrEqual","LessOrEqual","StartsWith","EndsWith","Contains","NotEqual","NotGreater","NotLess","NotGreaterOrEqual","NotLessOrEqual"],"x-enum-descriptions":{"None":"No operation specified","Equal":"Equals (eq)","Greater":"Greater than (gt)","Less":"Less than (lt)","GreaterOrEqual":"Greater than or equal (ge)","LessOrEqual":"Less than or equal (le)","StartsWith":"String starts with","EndsWith":"String ends with","Contains":"String contains","NotEqual":"Not equal (ne)","NotGreater":"Not greater than (ng)","NotLess":"Not less than (nl)","NotGreaterOrEqual":"Not greater than or equal (nge)","NotLessOrEqual":"Not less than or equal (nle)"},"title":"DataFilterOperations"}],"description":"Filter operation to apply"},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field type ID (when filtering on custom fields)"},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON path for filtering within complex editor values"},"Items":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":"circular(DataFilter)","description":"Nested filter conditions for complex AND/OR queries"}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"DataFilter"},"nullable":true}},"title":"GetAssetVerificationsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Verifications retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Paginated list of asset verification records.","properties":{"ItemCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of verifications returned."},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of verification records.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Full asset verification record including location and audit policy details.","properties":{"AssetVerificationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the verification record."},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset that was verified."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the verification was created.","nullable":true},"VerifiedByUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User that completed the verification.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"AssetVerificationTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Verification mode identifier such as `web-manual`.","example":"web-manual"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the verification passed."},"Comments":{"type":"string","description":"Optional notes captured during verification.","nullable":true},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS latitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"GPS longitude captured during mobile verification.","nullable":true},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the location. Obtain via [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2), extract `Items[].LocationId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getMyLocationsV2","endpoint":"GET /api/v2.0/locations","responseField":"Items[].LocationId"}},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional room within the location.","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"External identifier supplied by integrated systems.","nullable":true},"AssetAuditPolicyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Audit policy associated with this verification.","nullable":true},"ActualQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Actual quantity observed during inventory verification.","nullable":true},"ExpectedQuantity":{"type":"integer","description":"Expected quantity per inventory records.","nullable":true}},"title":"AssetVerification"}},"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination metadata for list responses.","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Current page index (zero-based)."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of items per page."},"TotalCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of items available."},"TotalPages":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available."}},"title":"PagingResponse"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code."},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp of the request."}},"title":"AssetVerificationListResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
